duties_responsibilities.duty: Engage clients in a welcoming manner and achieve sales goals using specialized selling models and product knowledge.
Introduce shoppers to multiple categories of the product to build brand loyalty and maximize sales results.
Maintain awareness of shoppers to deliver a world-class shopping experience and control loss prevention.
Complete product knowledge training to leverage driving sales and display personal accountability in achieving and exceeding sales and KPI targets.
Be aware of current product launches and promotions, support company initiatives, and build solid customer/client relationships.
Participate in visual directives, execute visual refreshes, and uphold exceptional cleaning standards.
Attend all scheduled shifts to ensure adequate coverage to meet company objectives.
